caption: A crowd surrounded the field on both sides, watching the game. A chubby man swung the golf club and hit the golf ball. The ball soared through the air for a long time and landed near the golf hole. People erupted in cheers. There was a woman in blue among the crowd. The next round of the game began. A man in brown hit the golf ball near the hole. Another new round of the game started. The chubby man hit the ball into the crowd, and then he managed to hit a large tree. Several players took turns hitting golf balls, and the audience continuously applauded and cheered.
